amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part A of House Report 118-108 to create a rapid-review requirement which would allow executive branch rules to go into effect if Congress does not pass a joint resolution within 70 legislative days.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to create a rapid-review requirement which would allow executive branch rules to go into effect if Congress does not pass a joint resolution within 70 legislative days.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green, Al (TX) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 221 (Roll no. 260).

action.text: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Green, Al (TX).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Green, Al (TX).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Green, Al (TX) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 221 (Roll no. 260).
